_source.text: 419 points out: "For those traveling on the Blue/Orange Line the walk to Capitol South might be better than L'Enfant, so as to possibly grab a seat on the train before it hits the train-changing station crunch at L'Enfant."

text: 419 points out: "For those traveling on the Blue/**Orange** **Line** the walk to Capitol South might be
**better** **than** L'Enfant, so as to possibly grab a seat on the train before it hits the train-changing station crunch at L'Enfant."

_source.text: After an afternoon at Wrigley Field watching the Cubbies, there wasn't much better than riding the Red Line down to Division Street and picking up some of that famous fried chicken.

text: After an afternoon at Wrigley Field watching the Cubbies, there wasn't much **better** **than** riding the
**Red** **Line** down to Division Street and picking up some of that famous fried chicken.

_source.text: 2. Head To Chinatown On A Boat As much as we don't mind the Red Line, sometimes nothing feels better than the wind flowing through your $35 blown-out hair.

text: 2. Head To Chinatown On A Boat As much as we don't mind the **Red** **Line**, sometimes nothing feels
**better** **than** the wind flowing through your $35 blown-out hair.

_source.text: 4. Do i leave red line off still or plug it back in since this waste gate is better than stock now.

text: 4. Do i leave **red** **line** off still or plug it back in since this waste gate **is** **better** **than** stock now.

_source.text: 12" paper trimmer, scissors, ruler, pencil, tape runner adhesive, strong tape adhesive (red line or scor-pal tape - narrow is better 1/8" or 1/4"), sanding tool, stapler, scoring tool, Distress Ink (I use Ranger Vintage Photo), ink blending tool, and non-stick craft mat, stapler.

text: 12" paper trimmer, scissors, ruler, pencil, tape runner adhesive, strong tape adhesive (**red** **line** or
scor-pal tape - narrow **is** **better** 1/8" or 1/4"), sanding tool, stapler, scoring tool, Distress Ink

_source.text: A bright green line against a dark brown background is MUCH better than that same green line against a blue sky.

text: A bright **green** **line** against a dark brown background is MUCH **better** **than** that same **green** **line** against a blue sky.
